pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Wagtail Font Awesome SVGAdd [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery&m=free) SVG icons to your Wagtail project.## Install pip install wagtail-font-awesome-svgAdd `wagtailfontawesomesvg` to your installed apps. INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'wagtailfontawesomesvg', ]## UsageThis is an [overview of available icons](https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery&m=free). Choose an icon and add it via your `wagtail_hooks.py`: from wagtail import hooks @hooks.register("register_icons") def register_icons(icons): return icons + [ 'wagtailfontawesomesvg/brands/facebook.svg', 'wagtailfontawesomesvg/regular/face-laugh.svg', 'wagtailfontawesomesvg/solid/yin-yang.svg', ... ]
